Package ohos.media.codec

Class PixelMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.codec.PixelMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public abstract class PixelMap
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    This class provides pixel map decoding data interface.

    Applications can use methods in this class to obtain basic pixel map information.

    Since:
    6
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia.Media

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  PixelMap.PixelPlane
      Represents a color plane of pixel map data.

      abstract void close​()
      Closes this pixel map.
      abstract int obtainPixelFormat​()
      Obtains the pixel format.
      abstract int obtainPixelHeight​()
      Obtains the number of pixels in each column of this pixel map.
      abstract PixelMap.PixelPlane[] obtainPixelPlanes​()
      Obtains the array of pixel planes for this pixel map.
      abstract long obtainPixelTimestamp​()
      Obtains the timestamp of this pixel map in nanoseconds.
      abstract int obtainPixelWidth​()
      Obtains the number of pixels in each row of this pixel map.
      void setClipRectangle​(Rect clipRect)
      Sets the clip rectangle in this pixel map.
